input: All birds can fly because they have wings.
output: This argument has factual error. Penguins have wings. Penguins can't fly. So not all birds can fly.

input: Humans have never set foot on any celestial body other than Earth.
output: This argument has factual error. Astronauts from the USA are humans. Astronauts from the USA landed on the lunar surface. So humans do have set foot on other celestial body.
